Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Very friendly staff. I felt like home.
Location was amazing with a room with sofas where smoke your joint in chill.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best poverty to relaxe and enjoy the evening! Maybe to always the best strains, but always the. Eat place to hang out! Very friendly staff with love for their job! Nice music and enough space to chill! Make sure to check out the specials! Nice prices and perfect stuff!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: So far I'd say this is my favorite coffeeshop I've visited here in Amsterdam. The staff were lovely, the atmosphere was perfect, the prices and quality of the flower was great, and I even liked the music (which has been a rare experience ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: At this place I tried the "Volcano Vaporizer" for the first time. An interesting experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Absolutely love this place, I visit every year, the staff are wonderful and don't care for employing people that aren't friendly and caring. It's always a pleasure, I'd love for them to have more space for more people by purchasing a second ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely coffeeshop with lots of inside space to enjoy a stay. The staff was always friendly and helped with everything that was needed (papes, filters, tobacco substitution). Important to note that smoking with tobacco inside is prohibited ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: insanely good hash and helpful staff, this is the best place if you're looking for very high quality hash at a fair price

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: One of my favourites. Super friendly staff, great music, fair prices and an extensive selection. They also have an area dedicated to tobacco which is super handy. They dont have a silly "have to buy a drink too" policy that alot of coffeeshops have. Couldn't ask for more. Theres also a very nice view on the top floor

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Wonderful place for coffee and great view.
Staff are also cheerful and greet you with smiles. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: One of my favourite coffeeshops in the city. Welcoming and polite staff, good selection with teas and coffees. A nice place to be.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Beautiful coffeeshop with indoor & outdoor seating, wide range of products, decent prices, delicious coffee and great staff.Bring some id otherwise, security won't let you in.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The bluebird was recommended by many friends. Unfortunately it was rather a bitter disappointment. I ate 1.5 space muffins and it didn't have any effect. My friend experienced the same the other day. Nevertheless, you can buy other stuff there and it's a location with culture and character.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Was off the beaten track,  more of a chilled vibe..  Lovely cappuccinos, lovely weed, especially the ''blue cookie''...
Friendly staff, not moody like alot of other cafes in the more frequently used areas (understandably)..

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Their muffins are for rather 4 than 2 people, take care
But their pre roll is amazing for ‚Ç¨4!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: This Coffeeshop is amazing.  We feel at home with our friends.  Comfortable on rainy days!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The coffee beans that they use are off great quality.  The drinks were prepared properly and were a perfect temperature to enjoy. The staff was a little bit annoying and were very hard to read and understand.  This coffee shop is conveniently located close to the Rembrandt house.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Friendly staff, really went the extra mile to help us out!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: A great Coffeeshop with interesting decor, good herb & great lattes! It‚Äôs a good spot to chill with the volcano! :)

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: It was nice to be there but staff was bit rude due to covid situation.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Some good indicia there.
Nice staff.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place with very professional and kind staff. They have a lot of different strains as well as many edibles. You can smoke on site or use one of stationary Volcanos with small, refundable deposit. Great place to have a coffee as well :)

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Best coffeeshop that I've been to, at list on this trip to Ams.
The stuff is friendly and have a lot of knowledge. The prices are low and the food is tasty. I will come back 4 sure!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Amazing place! Good and strong stuff, nice music.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Recently refurbished and looking fresh. Always have to visit Bluebirds everytime in Amsterdam. Best choice for a chilled atmosphere and great music

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Highly recommend for first-timer! The staff here are very helpful. They will give you clear instructions of how much you should take the product. I had half of a space cake and 2 hours later it hit me so strong! Good experience and good feelings.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: We came with a tour group a couple of weeks back. One of the party experienced his first whitey in 30 years. The staff were awesome. Genuinely caring and sound help to get him back on his feet with good advice and some blood sugar enhancement! Thanks guys!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice joint with all that you need... staff were very helpful in explaining what to try if you are a beginner üòã

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Wow, best Shop to chill, good price/quality, buy a lot when you are here!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place, convenient location too. The guy that works behind the counter selling the weed is super helpful, the girl working the coffee section seemed pretty annoyed with everyone though. Great pre-rolled joints at a fair price, and the smoking room is really chill. Open windows help to air the place out. I would reccomend!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good weed and vibes here. Came here when I first landed and got me some good dank a coffee and met a couple friends ! ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice weed there. Pretty good deals too, you can get 4.2g of Super Skunk for 35‚Ç¨. Relatively big chill Area where you can roll up your joints. Tobacco use is no problem just don't let your cigs/tobacco laying around.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: I am not a smoker and this is one of the only coffee shop I can stay in without suffocating from the smoke. The real extra for me was that I got to enjoy Latin rhythms of Company Segundo. Finally some good music in a coffee.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The place is great and the atmosphere is dope. The music is about as decent as it gets and the staff is friendly. Didn't get a chance to look at their weed menu,only got drinks there, which were fine.  Would give dice stars if the place ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place, to hang out at all times of the day. Really good price's. Silver Hybrid pure rolled were pretty cool, I had 5 üòò Been back 4 times. Def visit again. Thank you Bluebird staff üê¶ üíô

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: A nice and cozy place! The staff if very kind and helpful. You can get prerolled joints with or without tobacco and buy a wide variety of products. I highly recommend for first timers or regulars!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good weed at a good price. Smoking room was cosy in size but enough room to sit and drink comfortably. Free WiFi always a bonus. Drinks are a similar price to other herbal venues. We chose this place over most because of the friendly staff, seating availability, and unique atmosphere.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The best darn 'Coffee' in Amsterdam served with drinks and snacks in a relaxing environment with good tunes.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely place. Really enjoyed the atmosphere of the cafe. The location had volcanos for anyone to use if they wanted to leave a 10 pound deposit. Really reasonable prices with a variety of strains offering good qualitys for price.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great spot! Great coffee. Great weed at decent prices. Pleasant staff. Good music. Chill vibes. Hard to go wrong here! One of my favorite coffee shops.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Since 1982, one of the top oldest coffeeshops on Amsterdam..If you haven't been there ( and you like to smoke ur green), then you sort of missed-out on something....no worries,next year try again...great list, used to be a big binder with ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice weed, chill place.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Amazing staff and place to be

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place to get high quality bud. Nice staff and chill smoking lounge. Also has tables outside

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Easy to find even if you just arrived. Incredibly good selection (even if you've been smoking since '75!), helpful in multiple languages, Really good Smoothies and fresh orange juice too. Nice view, helpful budtenders, great place to have a ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Every one can find his place there. 1¬∞ floor pure only and 2¬∞ floor tobacco allowed =)
Nice and various music all the time. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place, knowledgeable staff. Great tea and hot chocolate. Its wasn't as busy as the other cafes around which suited us. Still has quality stuff. Hope to return in the future

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The man was extremely rude and unprofessional to my friends. It killed the vibes. He should honestly be fired. What a terrible way to run a business. Everything about the way he spoke to me and my friends should've been the complete opposite. Much better places to go. Waste of money. Weed wasn't that good. Will never return here.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Rude staff, went a couple doors down where they were very nice.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Roadworks are hiding this coffeeshop at the moment and a bit off the beaten track so could be hard to come across.
It has a nice, light and airy atmosphere and some comfy lounge like chairs on ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The staff could be nicer (the bouncers can be a little weird, and maybe the waitress was having a bad day) but the general vibe is good. The main part is for smoking pure joints (which I would recommend if you want to taste a lot of ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: They always have a really good selection of hash here. never lets me down.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: I‚Äôve been on the hunt for Gelato in Amsterdam since I have this strain grown at home (San Diego, CA). Went to almost 10 different cafes before I came across Bluebird and I should have started here all along.. they had Gelato! The priciest ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice selection of products and reasonable prices. One of my favourites.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Asked a barista for descriptions of the types of tea and got straight attitude. She told me to google it and then not to play with the person making my drinks. Never had such rude service.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place, good service and a great price.  Bluebird is one of the oldest coffeeshops in Amsterdam. It serves high quality products and has wonderful service. It has a separate seating area for smokers with Tabacco, where you can sit and enjoy a drink or snack with friends. The rest of the place has seating for pure smokers.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
I got there and there was a chill vibe, very nice and helpful service and a room apart for smoking with tabacco, barely any smoke.
Sometimes it was busy but the line was gone within minutes, fast service ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good stuff and staff, nice music, available a few Volcanos.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: I was very disappointed with this coffee shop, my first marijuana experience in Amsterdam and the tree was awful. Reggie Miller definitely lives there! Too many seeds and sticks not good at all, very wack  buds.  I wish I could give them a half star.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Really nice coffee shop, great selection of weed, good food (toasties mainly), nice smoking area, good service, and free WiFi too! Would recommend this place! They've also got a few bongs and a vaporizer for you to use.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: A bit cramped. Good vibe. Nice music. Awesome mint tea. Had a really good time there! Great highs! Good quality. Cannabis college recomended.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Ok weed but great hasj

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great weed, selection, staff and atmosphere! It can be busy but a table frees up relatively fast if you're willing to wait a bit.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Bluebird had a great run as one of the better shops in town, but we've not seen much of them lately. See some of our older reviews with a simple google search. The place looks largely the same as for the last 2 decades, a bit "squatty", ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Located in a modern and Main Street, But have some distance with the Red Light District and tourist area, that‚Äôs what I like . Drink and weed is very nice. Friendly service.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: I'd 100% recommend this place and as a tourist was treated great. If you are going to partake, be warned, you have to make it back down the treacherous stairs. Partake at the bottom. I think I spent an hour too scared I was going to fall leaving. Other than that lol it's amazing.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: That was the first coffeeshop in Amasterdam that I visited, and since then everytime when I am in the city I'll go there. Great place, kind of trippy (well, it should be!), nice crew and cosy inside. I really enjoy time spend there, even those curvy really steep stairs. That was so fun! I need to go back there ASAP!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
This coffeeshop is for me one of the best in Amsterdam.

Especially the lounge on the first floor is very cozy and invites you to linger. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Probably one of the most famous coffee shops in Amsterdam. It was recommended to me by the guys from the Cannabis College as the best coffee shop close to the Red Light District (referring mostly to the fact, that you can trust their weed ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
This was one of my favourites for the lemon haze which is amazing! and the amnesia haze, the best I've ever smoked!
When I first walked in there where two blokes that reminded me of cheech and ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Been going to the bluebird for over 20 years. Nice range of weed and drinks and snacks. It's not a big place and has a nice atmosphere. Well recommended.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Weed quality was ok & staff seemed a little terse during our visit. I dont like coffee shops where the weed is either weighed or bagged out of sight. Always makes me edgy!!!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Whenever I am in Amsterdam I always visit the Bluebird. For me it is an Amsterdam staple. Friendly staff and since the refurb it has a much crisp and cleaner feel to it. Will be back.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Classic coffeeshop that is definitely worth visiting, plenty of seating as there is two floors aswell as outdoor seating, super friendly staff, who have bongs and other smoking accessories available

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Delightful, brilliant service plus a lovely team that works there and good company not to mention how beautiful it is... It's a must see place why in Amsterdam even if you don't smoke, just go in the morning for thier fresh juice and ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very helpful and informative staff. However, it's not a nice place to chill like others have suggested. It's dark and feels seedy.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great coffee shop, definitely one to visit. Always really friendly staff, loads of seating upstairs and downstairs, little outdoor seating area too great when the sun's out. Right near a few nice places to eat too.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Good place for coffee and weeds.
You can even smoke outside with chairs and tables so you can enjoy your smoking outside with great Netherlands views.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Smoking room is small and they don't wide selection of weed but the few they have are very good quality. Cozy and nice music but the wi-fi doesnt work :p

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: My favourite coffee shop in Dam! We kept coming back. Great vibe, not too expensive, loads of snacks and great space muffins

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Was an amazing experience to have a joint while sipping a cappuccino and having a chat with the locals. The smoking room while cosy in size, had a fair amount of room compared to other coffeeshops.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: My fave, recent refit makes for more room in upstairs smokii g room. You can't go wrong with bluebirds it's a briliant coffeeshop and has been great every visit for 25years

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: went to a variety of coffee shops over our 4 day break in the city and bluebird was one of the most memorable, friendly staff and interesting art work coating the walls, was quite disappointed to be told we were not allowed to take pictures.. but other than that really tranquil atmosphere.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: My first coffeeshop experience. I loved the vibe in here and met some cool people. Prices are reasonable. Rather cramped inside though, and they only accept cash payments.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: My favourite coffee shop I visited whilst in Amsterdam! The art in there is incredibly mind blowing, the weed is exceptional and the presence of place is enlightening, sing on bluebirdd üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: A very special place if you come here a another country. But it was ok. The prices are friendly.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very nice place with 2 floors. Awesome spot at the bar where you can watch the flow. Good tea with cookies and honey.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Bluebird coffee shop is small and can get hectic but if you don't mind that, their staff is extremely patient and helpful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Really liked this place i would be sure to go back. Good weed, Good menu, Good vibes, good Day or Night smoking experience well located Thanks Blue Bird.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice place loved the volcano

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: This sis a nice chilled coffee shop, good selection of board games lots of cannabis books, pool table and a good menu. What's not to like.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good shop, next time I'm around I'll be happy to visit you again üòç

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Been here multiple times and we all loved it! Other shops are too touristy and the products doesn't do the job either for the high prices...very friendly space, good prices and very good products..worth the walk even if it's a little off the centre.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Dont go there. Rude staff and dont leave you alone one minute with their rules. Dont smoke here...dont sit on this table..dont role tigarette here but they are a smoking coffee place. So annoying while in other coffee shops was so relaxing.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: I Went to TEN coffee shops in three days; Bluebird had both amazing hash and weed. The experience was friendly and the people all around cool. This is NOT the atmosphere in all the weed coffee shops. Some shops make you buy drinks to sit ‚Ä¶

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Bluebird coffee shop wasn't the biggest of its kind. But apart from that i would still give it a 5 star,s, as the atmosphere is first class with great staff and a friendly experience to boot.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Wonderfully. Highly recommended. Very chill coffee, a lot of weed to choose from... The music was very good. Seemed like more locals come to this place

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Unique atmosphere. Bonus room for tobacco smokers. Double bonus with volcanos for main area, triple bonus for beautiful art.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great selection of "coffee" and very friendly bar staff. I went in after dark and the line was somewhat long but took no time at all. Will def stop here again on my next visit to Amsterdam.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: This is a laid-back, more 'independently' stylized coffeeshop. Nice open atmosphere already in early afternoon. Product quality up to high local standards.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Their chocolate muffins are way too strong. They are too intense for inexperienced people/tourist. They should make that clear.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great service, stash and vibe.  Has lots of volcanoes for vaping. Love BlueBird and will always go back.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best coffee shop in Amsterdam I found so far really nice people and staff. sum awesome weed reasonable price

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best cs in Amsterdam, especially for hashish. The place is old school vibes. Weed is prebagged but no complain about.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best muffin tried in Amsterdam, the bluebarry

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Have been going for many years and enjoy the coffee shop. Busy at peak times and difficult to find a seat upstairs most days so get there early!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: They sell my absolute favorite: Dr. Greenspoon. Try this and you won't be disappointed. They have a good selection and average prices. Alltough there is not too much space (as like in every cofeshop), I liked it a lot.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: One of my mine and my girlfriends favourite coffee shops. Good weed, good staff, good prices! Hand painted art work on the walls :)

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Lovely cosy little two story place with a decent selection and helpful staff.
Always great music playing and a decent atmosphere :)
Tasty treats at the bar as well!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very friendly chilled-out place, reasonable prices for good quality. Excellent & hard working staff make this a very pleasurable experience, well worth a visit.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Great cafe!!
Recommended by the Cannabis College  so we went to check it out. They have a good selection of herbs, and a nice place at the back to sit and chill

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Relaxed atmosphere, nice music. Prices were OK, good quality. Not that crowded as other places in that area.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very clean, nice staff, can smoke cannabis and tobacco, marijuana is not the best but a nice place to relax and enjoy your spliff

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: What happened to the old psychedelic and cosy Blue bird ?! It looks cheap, plastic, and soulless üò±üò±üò± I‚Äôm mourning forever. Where did the beautiful and odd wall paintings go ? Such a waste.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Was a lovely place to sit and have a joint and a coffee, the place has a relaxing yet lively atmosphere, very much enjoyed the milkshake it was freshly made. üòä

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good quality. Try the muffin if you're staying for a few days, make sure you're close to the hotel after and remember to share!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Decent tunes, relaxed vibe and a tobacco room. Lovely staff and recently renovated. ( although was just as good before )

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Always feel like home there. Good selection of teas! Should need more vegan food tho :)

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very cool spot, nice staff. Much more chilled out atmosphere than a lot of the coffeeshops around the city

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Slightly away from the main streets so a quieter chilled out atmosphere. Friendly and helpful staff with space for a few groups.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good price and quality, friendly stuff. They even have vapes (volcano) which is not that common in Amsterdam!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Fantastic coffee shop. Great choice of hashish and Grass. With the added benefit of having an area for smoking tobbaco Doobies

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best weed/best pricing. The Bird is a nice place where you can have the best smoothie or chai.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Warm, comfortable, and welcoming environment. Very chill and laid back. Some good yummy ‚Äúcoffee‚Äù üòãü§†

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The only thing I think this place was missing would be a window to grab your buds from. But other then that I loved all the art on the walls and people that worked there.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice to be greeted on arrival, very helpful about recommended strains for a beginner smoker, not pushy at all

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: My first experience in Amsterdam 20 years ago, once  they're done with the refurb I'm sure another generation of heads will love it

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Not for me. Place had a bad vibe and not cool. Plenty more cool coffee shops to be had. Walked in staff were rude and not your obvious coffee shop.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: 4.5 star. Very good place. Good weed, good coffee, good service. The only problem that is a bit small for this amount of people.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good advice for the newbie in our group and welcoming to those not smoking like me. Both a smoking room, open area for smoking and downstairs which is none smoking which I found good.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Pretty great place. First stop after dropping stuff off at the hotel. Great menu. Lovely lovely people working here.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Real chilled place good to sit down and smoke. Friendly customer service and very helpful.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: One of the best coffeeshop, if you are a veteran smocker, if you know what cannabis is, allways the same top quality, trough the years, never disappoint a very difficoult client like me

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great variety and information on what's best for your need. Nice layout shelves well stocked.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best deal in town for 35euro and a great place to chill. Was here ten years ago and time has stood still. Consistency is appreciated

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great coffee shop, not too busy and nicely decorated. Good environment and helpful staff.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Good coffee shop, got some lime haze and OG kush both real tasty smokes. Best fresh juice I've tried in a coffee shop also, will defo be back!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: One of the workers took me from my waiting Lane and he was so((( racist )))because I'm Arabic.  try to be more Profesional next time if you don't want kind of people to go into your coffee shop because your RACISM just put a sign.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: This was my favourite coffee shop in Amsterdam due to the quirky interior and friendly staff, you can‚Äôt go wrong coming here and the queues show that

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice atmosphere little bit small. But overall it was a good coffee shop

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Reasonable prices and friendly staff

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Kind of small, but cozy. The guy who checked my i.d. was very friendly, as well as the people I shared space with in the smoking lounge. :)

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Perfect üëå place to get coffee and relax in a way you can do only in Amsterdam probably üòâ

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Really great staff who know their stuff and really helpful. It isn't pricey with a big selection and overall ambiance is great.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Did not accept credit cards when we visited. Luckily we had some cash and were able to enjoy their lounge area!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: It really is a beautiful place. I met the nicest people there and made friend with them and had a great time. I will go there everytime I get to Amsterdam

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Definitely one of my favorite coffee shop for style and music, unfortunately I have to say they like to f**k tourists!!!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Didn't sit inside so not sure about atmosphere, but liked what I saw. Has outdoor seating also

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: A very friendly place with a great selection of goods too. My personal favourite since I discovered it a few years ago

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Don‚Äôt buy the weed muffins here.. tasted like muffins.. had no effect after eating two! Not sure how ratings are soo high

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very good atmosphere love this place very nice weed watch the world go by good music reasonable priced drinks

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place, friendly people and atmosphere everyone makes you feel welcome very chill vibe

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very nice coffee shop staff very helpful and friendly and the weed is tops too

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place to chill, nice atmosphere. However, it is crowded sometimes due to tourists so sometimes there are long lines and no available seating.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Prices are fair, service is good. It is allowed to smoke tobacco inside.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best coffee shop for muffins/ space-cakes in Amsterdam. If you want to have a good time then come here.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: My most favourite coffee shop for snacks; drinks; staff hospitality and the bud is great quality and good prices.

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
Review Text: The famous Bluebird Coffeeshop! One of the best in town. Nice atmosphere, good music, good stuff, friendly staff. You've got to visit it!

Name: Bluebird Coffeeshop
